description: Technical enough for an afterwork training session, yet stylish and comfy enough that you’ll want to keep it on after the session ends and the party begins, the Stone Hoody looks as good as it climbs. With a hood for chilly commutes to the gym, the Stone Hoody has a touch of stretch for mobility and a kangaroo-style pocket plus a zip security pocket to store wallets and keys while on the go.
name: Black Diamond Stone Hoody - Mens
